verses.arabic: يسٓ
verses.arabicSimple: يسٓ
verses.translation: Ya, Seen.
verses.transliteration: Yaa-Seeen

verses.arabic: وَٱلْقُرْءَانِ ٱلْحَكِيمِ
verses.arabicSimple: وَٱلْقُرْءَانِ ٱلْحَكِيمِ
verses.translation: By the wise Qur'an.
verses.transliteration: Wal-Qur-aanil-Hakeem

verses.arabic: إِنَّكَ لَمِنَ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: إِنَّكَ لَمِنَ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.translation: Indeed you, [O Muhammad], are from among the messengers,
verses.transliteration: Innaka laminal mursaleen

verses.arabic: عَلَىٰ صِرَٰطٍ مُّسْتَقِيمٍ
verses.arabicSimple: عَلَىٰ صِرَٰطٍ مُّسْتَقِيمٍ
verses.translation: On a straight path.
verses.transliteration: 'Alaa Siraatim Mustaqeem

verses.arabic: تَنزِيلَ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ
verses.arabicSimple: تَنزِيلَ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ
verses.translation: [This is] a revelation of the Exalted in Might, the Merciful,
verses.transliteration: Tanzeelal 'Azeezir Raheem

verses.arabic: لِتُنذِرَ قَوْمًا مَّآ أُنذِرَ ءَابَآؤُهُمْ فَهُمْ غَـٰفِلُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: لِتُنذِرَ قَوْمًا مَّآ أُنذِرَ ءَابَآؤُهُمْ فَهُمْ غَـٰفِلُونَ
verses.translation: That you may warn a people whose forefathers were not warned, so they are unaware.
verses.transliteration: Litunzira qawmam maaa unzira aabaaa'uhum fahum ghaafiloon

verses.arabic: لَقَدْ حَقَّ ٱلْقَوْلُ عَلَىٰٓ أَكْثَرِهِمْ فَهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: لَقَدْ حَقَّ ٱلْقَوْلُ عَلَىٰٓ أَكْثَرِهِمْ فَهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.translation: Already the word has come into effect upon most of them, so they do not believe.
verses.transliteration: Laqad haqqal qawlu 'alaaa aksarihim fahum laa yu'minoon

verses.arabic: إِنَّا جَعَلْنَا فِىٓ أَعْنَـٰقِهِمْ أَغْلَـٰلًا فَهِىَ إِلَى ٱلْأَذْقَانِ فَهُم مُّقْمَحُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: إِنَّا جَعَلْنَا فِىٓ أَعْنَـٰقِهِمْ أَغْلَـٰلًا فَهِىَ إِلَى ٱلْأَذْقَانِ فَهُم مُّقْمَحُونَ
verses.translation: Indeed, We have put shackles on their necks, and they are to their chins, so they are with heads [kept] aloft.
verses.transliteration: Innaa ja'alnaa feee a'naaqihim aghlaalan fahiya ilal azqaani fahum muqmahoon

verses.arabic: وَجَعَلْنَا مِنۢ بَيْنِ أَيْدِيهِمْ سَدًّا وَمِنْ خَلْفِهِمْ سَدًّا فَأَغْشَيْنَـٰهُمْ فَهُمْ لَا يُبْصِرُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَجَعَلْنَا مِنۢ بَيْنِ أَيْدِيهِمْ سَدًّا وَمِنْ خَلْفِهِمْ سَدًّا فَأَغْشَيْنَـٰهُمْ فَهُمْ لَا يُبْصِرُونَ
verses.translation: And We have put before them a barrier and behind them a barrier and covered them, so they do not see.
verses.transliteration: Wa ja'alnaa mim baini aydeehim saddanw-wa min khalfihim saddan fa aghshai naahum fahum laa yubsiroon

verses.arabic: وَسَوَآءٌ عَلَيْهِمْ ءَأَنذَرْتَهُمْ أَمْ لَمْ تُنذِرْهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَسَوَآءٌ عَلَيْهِمْ ءَأَنذَرْتَهُمْ أَمْ لَمْ تُنذِرْهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.translation: And it is all the same for them whether you warn them or do not warn them - they will not believe.
verses.transliteration: Wa sawaaa'un 'alaihim 'a-anzartahum am lam tunzirhum laa yu'minoon

verses.arabic: إِنَّمَا تُنذِرُ مَنِ ٱتَّبَعَ ٱلذِّكْرَ وَخَشِىَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنَ بِٱلْغَيْبِ ۖ فَبَشِّرْهُ بِمَغْفِرَةٍ وَأَجْرٍ كَرِيمٍ
verses.arabicSimple: إِنَّمَا تُنذِرُ مَنِ ٱتَّبَعَ ٱلذِّكْرَ وَخَشِىَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنَ بِٱلْغَيْبِ ۖ فَبَشِّرْهُ بِمَغْفِرَةٍ وَأَجْرٍ كَرِيمٍ
verses.translation: You can only warn one who follows the message and fears the Most Merciful unseen. So give him good tidings of forgiveness and noble reward.
verses.transliteration: Innamaa tunziru manit taba 'az-Zikra wa khashiyar Rahmaana bilghaib, fabashshirhu bimaghfiratinw-wa ajrin kareem

segments.arabic: إِنَّمَا تُنذِرُ مَنِ ٱتَّبَعَ ٱلذِّكْرَ وَخَشِىَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنَ بِٱلْغَيْبِ ۖ
segments.translation: Only you can warn him who follows the Reminder and fears the Most Gracious in the unseen
segments.transliteration: innamā tundhiru mani ittabaʿa l-dhik'ra wakhashiya l-raḥmāna bil-ghaybi

segments.translation: So give him glad tidings of forgiveness and a reward noble

verses.arabic: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نُحْىِ ٱلْمَوْتَىٰ وَنَكْتُبُ مَا قَدَّمُوا۟ وَءَاثَـٰرَهُمْ ۚ وَكُلَّ شَىْءٍ أَحْصَيْنَـٰهُ فِىٓ إِمَامٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.arabicSimple: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نُحْىِ ٱلْمَوْتَىٰ وَنَكْتُبُ مَا قَدَّمُوا۟ وَءَاثَـٰرَهُمْ ۚ وَكُلَّ شَىْءٍ أَحْصَيْنَـٰهُ فِىٓ إِمَامٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.translation: Indeed, it is We who bring the dead to life and record what they have put forth and what they left behind, and all things We have enumerated in a clear register.
verses.transliteration: Innaa Nahnu nuhyil mawtaa wa naktubu maa qaddamoo wa aasaarahum; wa kulla shai'in ahsainaahu feee Imaamim Mubeen

segments.arabic: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نُحْىِ ٱلْمَوْتَىٰ وَنَكْتُبُ مَا قَدَّمُوا۟ وَءَاثَـٰرَهُمْ ۚ
segments.translation: Indeed, We [We] [We] give life to the dead and We record what they have sent before and their footprints
segments.transliteration: innā naḥnu nuḥ'yī l-mawtā wanaktubu mā qaddamū waāthārahum

segments.arabic: وَكُلَّ شَىْءٍ أَحْصَيْنَـٰهُ فِىٓ إِمَامٍ مُّبِينٍ
segments.translation: and every thing We have enumerated it in a Register clear
segments.transliteration: wakulla shayin aḥṣaynāhu fī imāmin mubīnin

verses.arabic: وَٱضْرِبْ لَهُم مَّثَلًا أَصْحَـٰبَ ٱلْقَرْيَةِ إِذْ جَآءَهَا ٱلْمُرْسَلُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَٱضْرِبْ لَهُم مَّثَلًا أَصْحَـٰبَ ٱلْقَرْيَةِ إِذْ جَآءَهَا ٱلْمُرْسَلُونَ
verses.translation: And present to them an example: the people of the city, when the messengers came to it -
verses.transliteration: Wadrib lahum masalan Ashaabal Qaryatih; iz jaaa'ahal mursaloon

verses.arabic: إِذْ أَرْسَلْنَآ إِلَيْهِمُ ٱثْنَيْنِ فَكَذَّبُوهُمَا فَعَزَّزْنَا بِثَالِثٍ فَقَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّآ إِلَيْكُم مُّرْسَلُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: إِذْ أَرْسَلْنَآ إِلَيْهِمُ ٱثْنَيْنِ فَكَذَّبُوهُمَا فَعَزَّزْنَا بِثَالِثٍ فَقَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّآ إِلَيْكُم مُّرْسَلُونَ
verses.translation: When We sent to them two but they denied them, so We strengthened them with a third, and they said, "Indeed, we are messengers to you."
verses.transliteration: Iz arsalnaaa ilaihimusnaini fakazzaboohumaa fa'azzaznaa bisaalisin faqaalooo innaaa ilaikum mursaloon

words.translation: but they denied both of them

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ مَآ أَنتُمْ إِلَّا بَشَرٌ مِّثْلُنَا وَمَآ أَنزَلَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ مِن شَىْءٍ إِنْ أَنتُمْ إِلَّا تَكْذِبُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: قَالُوا۟ مَآ أَنتُمْ إِلَّا بَشَرٌ مِّثْلُنَا وَمَآ أَنزَلَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ مِن شَىْءٍ إِنْ أَنتُمْ إِلَّا تَكْذِبُونَ
verses.translation: They said, "You are not but human beings like us, and the Most Merciful has not revealed a thing. You are only telling lies."
verses.transliteration: Qaaloo maaa antum illaa basharum mislunaa wa maaa anzalar Rahmaanu min shai'in in antum illaa takziboon

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ رَبُّنَا يَعْلَمُ إِنَّآ إِلَيْكُمْ لَمُرْسَلُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: قَالُوا۟ رَبُّنَا يَعْلَمُ إِنَّآ إِلَيْكُمْ لَمُرْسَلُونَ
verses.translation: They said, "Our Lord knows that we are messengers to you,
verses.transliteration: Qaaloo Rabbunaa ya'lamu innaaa ilaikum lamursaloon

verses.arabic: وَمَا عَلَيْنَآ إِلَّا ٱلْبَلَـٰغُ ٱلْمُبِينُ
verses.arabicSimple: وَمَا عَلَيْنَآ إِلَّا ٱلْبَلَـٰغُ ٱلْمُبِينُ
verses.translation: And we are not responsible except for clear notification."
verses.transliteration: Wa maa 'alainaaa illal balaaghul mubeen

verses.arabic: قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّا تَطَيَّرْنَا بِكُمْ ۖ لَئِن لَّمْ تَنتَهُوا۟ لَنَرْجُمَنَّكُمْ وَلَيَمَسَّنَّكُم مِّنَّا عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ
verses.arabicSimple: قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّا تَطَيَّرْنَا بِكُمْ ۖ لَئِن لَّمْ تَنتَهُوا۟ لَنَرْجُمَنَّكُمْ وَلَيَمَسَّنَّكُم مِّنَّا عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ
verses.translation: They said, "Indeed, we consider you a bad omen. If you do not desist, we will surely stone you, and there will surely touch you, from us, a painful punishment."
verses.transliteration: Qaaloo innaa tataiyarnaa bikum la'il-lam tantahoo lanar jumannakum wa la-yamassan nakum minnaa 'azaabun aleem

segments.translation: They said Indeed, we [we] see an evil omen from you

segments.arabic: لَئِن لَّمْ تَنتَهُوا۟ لَنَرْجُمَنَّكُمْ وَلَيَمَسَّنَّكُم مِّنَّا عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ
segments.translation: If not you desist surely, we will stone you and surely will touch you from us a punishment painful
segments.transliteration: la-in lam tantahū lanarjumannakum walayamassannakum minnā ʿadhābun alīmun

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ طَـٰٓئِرُكُم مَّعَكُمْ ۚ أَئِن ذُكِّرْتُم ۚ بَلْ أَنتُمْ قَوْمٌ مُّسْرِفُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: قَالُوا۟ طَـٰٓئِرُكُم مَّعَكُمْ ۚ أَئِن ذُكِّرْتُم ۚ بَلْ أَنتُمْ قَوْمٌ مُّسْرِفُونَ
verses.translation: They said, "Your omen is with yourselves. Is it because you were reminded? Rather, you are a transgressing people."
verses.transliteration: Qaaloo taaa'irukum ma'akum; a'in zukkirtum; bal antum qawmum musrifoon

segments.translation: They said Your evil omen be with you
Is it because you are admonished
Nay you are a people transgressing

verses.arabic: وَجَآءَ مِنْ أَقْصَا ٱلْمَدِينَةِ رَجُلٌ يَسْعَىٰ قَالَ يَـٰقَوْمِ ٱتَّبِعُوا۟ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَجَآءَ مِنْ أَقْصَا ٱلْمَدِينَةِ رَجُلٌ يَسْعَىٰ قَالَ يَـٰقَوْمِ ٱتَّبِعُوا۟ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.translation: And there came from the farthest end of the city a man, running. He said, "O my people, follow the messengers.
verses.transliteration: Wa jaaa'a min aqsal madeenati rajuluny yas'aa qaala yaa qawmit tabi'ul mursaleen

verses.arabic: ٱتَّبِعُوا۟ مَن لَّا يَسْـَٔلُكُمْ أَجْرًا وَهُم مُّهْتَدُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: ٱتَّبِعُوا۟ مَن لَّا يَسْـَٔلُكُمْ أَجْرًا وَهُم مُّهْتَدُونَ
verses.translation: Follow those who do not ask of you [any] payment, and they are [rightly] guided.
verses.transliteration: Ittabi'oo mal-laa yas'alukum ajranw-wa hum muhtadoon

verses.arabic: وَمَا لِىَ لَآ أَعْبُدُ ٱلَّذِى فَطَرَنِى وَإِلَيْهِ تُرْجَعُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَمَا لِىَ لَآ أَعْبُدُ ٱلَّذِى فَطَرَنِى وَإِلَيْهِ تُرْجَعُونَ
verses.translation: And why should I not worship He who created me and to whom you will be returned?
verses.transliteration: Wa maa liya laaa a'budul lazee fataranee wa ilaihi turja'oon

verses.arabic: ءَأَتَّخِذُ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ ءَالِهَةً إِن يُرِدْنِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ بِضُرٍّ لَّا تُغْنِ عَنِّى شَفَـٰعَتُهُمْ شَيْـًٔا وَلَا يُنقِذُونِ
verses.arabicSimple: ءَأَتَّخِذُ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ ءَالِهَةً إِن يُرِدْنِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ بِضُرٍّ لَّا تُغْنِ عَنِّى شَفَـٰعَتُهُمْ شَيْـًٔا وَلَا يُنقِذُونِ
verses.translation: Should I take other than Him [false] deities [while], if the Most Merciful intends for me some adversity, their intercession will not avail me at all, nor can they save me?
verses.transliteration: 'A-attakhizu min dooniheee aalihatan iny-yuridnir Rahmaanu bidurril-laa tughni 'annee shafaa 'atuhum shai 'anw-wa laa yunqizoon

verses.arabic: إِنِّىٓ إِذًا لَّفِى ضَلَـٰلٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.arabicSimple: إِنِّىٓ إِذًا لَّفِى ضَلَـٰلٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.translation: Indeed, I would then be in manifest error.
verses.transliteration: Inneee izal-lafee dalaa-lim-mubeen

verses.arabic: إِنِّىٓ ءَامَنتُ بِرَبِّكُمْ فَٱسْمَعُونِ
verses.arabicSimple: إِنِّىٓ ءَامَنتُ بِرَبِّكُمْ فَٱسْمَعُونِ
verses.translation: Indeed, I have believed in your Lord, so listen to me."
verses.transliteration: Inneee aamantu bi Rabbikum fasma'oon

verses.arabic: قِيلَ ٱدْخُلِ ٱلْجَنَّةَ ۖ قَالَ يَـٰلَيْتَ قَوْمِى يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: قِيلَ ٱدْخُلِ ٱلْجَنَّةَ ۖ قَالَ يَـٰلَيْتَ قَوْمِى يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: It was said, "Enter Paradise." He said, "I wish my people could know
verses.transliteration: Qeelad khulil Jannnah; qaala yaa laita qawmee ya'lamoon

segments.translation: It was said Enter Paradise
He said I wish my people knew

verses.arabic: بِمَا غَفَرَ لِى رَبِّى وَجَعَلَنِى مِنَ ٱلْمُكْرَمِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: بِمَا غَفَرَ لِى رَبِّى وَجَعَلَنِى مِنَ ٱلْمُكْرَمِينَ
verses.translation: Of how my Lord has forgiven me and placed me among the honored."
verses.transliteration: Bimaa ghafara lee Rabbee wa ja'alanee minal mukrameen

verses.arabic: ۞ وَمَآ أَنزَلْنَا عَلَىٰ قَوْمِهِۦ مِنۢ بَعْدِهِۦ مِن جُندٍ مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَمَا كُنَّا مُنزِلِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: ۞ وَمَآ أَنزَلْنَا عَلَىٰ قَوْمِهِۦ مِنۢ بَعْدِهِۦ مِن جُندٍ مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَمَا كُنَّا مُنزِلِينَ
verses.translation: And We did not send down upon his people after him any soldiers from the heaven, nor would We have done so.
verses.transliteration: Wa maaa anzalnaa 'alaa qawmihee mim ba'dihee min jundim minas-samaaa'i wa maa kunnaa munzileen

verses.arabic: إِن كَانَتْ إِلَّا صَيْحَةً وَٰحِدَةً فَإِذَا هُمْ خَـٰمِدُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: إِن كَانَتْ إِلَّا صَيْحَةً وَٰحِدَةً فَإِذَا هُمْ خَـٰمِدُونَ
verses.translation: It was not but one shout, and immediately they were extinguished.
verses.transliteration: In kaanat illaa saihatanw waahidatan fa-izaa hum khaamidoon

verses.arabic: يَـٰحَسْرَةً عَلَى ٱلْعِبَادِ ۚ مَا يَأْتِيهِم مِّن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا كَانُوا۟ بِهِۦ يَسْتَهْزِءُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: يَـٰحَسْرَةً عَلَى ٱلْعِبَادِ ۚ مَا يَأْتِيهِم مِّن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا كَانُوا۟ بِهِۦ يَسْتَهْزِءُونَ
verses.translation: How regretful for the servants. There did not come to them any messenger except that they used to ridicule him.
verses.transliteration: Yaa hasratan 'alal 'ibaad; maa yaateehim mir Rasoolin illaa kaanoo bihee yastahzi 'oon

segments.translation: Alas for the servants

segments.arabic: مَا يَأْتِيهِم مِّن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا كَانُوا۟ بِهِۦ يَسْتَهْزِءُونَ
segments.translation: Not came to them any Messenger but they did mock at him mock at him
segments.transliteration: mā yatīhim min rasūlin illā kānū bihi yastahziūna

verses.arabic: أَلَمْ يَرَوْا۟ كَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا قَبْلَهُم مِّنَ ٱلْقُرُونِ أَنَّهُمْ إِلَيْهِمْ لَا يَرْجِعُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: أَلَمْ يَرَوْا۟ كَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا قَبْلَهُم مِّنَ ٱلْقُرُونِ أَنَّهُمْ إِلَيْهِمْ لَا يَرْجِعُونَ
verses.translation: Have they not considered how many generations We destroyed before them - that they to them will not return?
verses.transliteration: Alam yaraw kam ahlak naa qablahum minal qurooni annahum ilaihim laa yarji'oon

verses.arabic: وَإِن كُلٌّ لَّمَّا جَمِيعٌ لَّدَيْنَا مُحْضَرُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَإِن كُلٌّ لَّمَّا جَمِيعٌ لَّدَيْنَا مُحْضَرُونَ
verses.translation: And indeed, all of them will yet be brought present before Us.
verses.transliteration: Wa in kullul lammaa jamee'ul-ladainaa muhdaroon

verses.arabic: وَءَايَةٌ لَّهُمُ ٱلْأَرْضُ ٱلْمَيْتَةُ أَحْيَيْنَـٰهَا وَأَخْرَجْنَا مِنْهَا حَبًّا فَمِنْهُ يَأْكُلُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَءَايَةٌ لَّهُمُ ٱلْأَرْضُ ٱلْمَيْتَةُ أَحْيَيْنَـٰهَا وَأَخْرَجْنَا مِنْهَا حَبًّا فَمِنْهُ يَأْكُلُونَ
verses.translation: And a sign for them is the dead earth. We have brought it to life and brought forth from it grain, and from it they eat.
verses.transliteration: Wa Aayatul lahumul ardul maitatu ahyainaahaa wa akhrajnaa minhaa habban faminhu yaakuloon

verses.arabic: وَجَعَلْنَا فِيهَا جَنَّـٰتٍ مِّن نَّخِيلٍ وَأَعْنَـٰبٍ وَفَجَّرْنَا فِيهَا مِنَ ٱلْعُيُونِ
verses.arabicSimple: وَجَعَلْنَا فِيهَا جَنَّـٰتٍ مِّن نَّخِيلٍ وَأَعْنَـٰبٍ وَفَجَّرْنَا فِيهَا مِنَ ٱلْعُيُونِ
verses.translation: And We placed therein gardens of palm trees and grapevines and caused to burst forth therefrom some springs -
verses.transliteration: Wa ja'alnaa feehaa jannaatim min nakheelinw wa a'naabinw wa fajjarnaa feeha minal 'uyoon

words.translation: and We caused to gush forth

verses.arabic: لِيَأْكُلُوا۟ مِن ثَمَرِهِۦ وَمَا عَمِلَتْهُ أَيْدِيهِمْ ۖ أَفَلَا يَشْكُرُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: لِيَأْكُلُوا۟ مِن ثَمَرِهِۦ وَمَا عَمِلَتْهُ أَيْدِيهِمْ ۖ أَفَلَا يَشْكُرُونَ
verses.translation: That they may eat of His fruit. And their hands have not produced it, so will they not be grateful?
verses.transliteration: Liyaakuloo min samarihee wa maa 'amilat-hu aideehim; afalaa yashkuroon

segments.arabic: لِيَأْكُلُوا۟ مِن ثَمَرِهِۦ وَمَا عَمِلَتْهُ أَيْدِيهِمْ ۖ
segments.translation: That they may eat of its fruit And not made it their hands
segments.transliteration: liyakulū min thamarihi wamā ʿamilathu aydīhim

segments.translation: So will not they be grateful

verses.arabic: سُبْحَـٰنَ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ ٱلْأَزْوَٰجَ كُلَّهَا مِمَّا تُنۢبِتُ ٱلْأَرْضُ وَمِنْ أَنفُسِهِمْ وَمِمَّا لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: سُبْحَـٰنَ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ ٱلْأَزْوَٰجَ كُلَّهَا مِمَّا تُنۢبِتُ ٱلْأَرْضُ وَمِنْ أَنفُسِهِمْ وَمِمَّا لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: Exalted is He who created all pairs - from what the earth grows and from themselves and from that which they do not know.
verses.transliteration: Subhaanal lazee khalaqal azwaaja kullahaa mimmaa tumbitul ardu wa min anfusihim wa mimmaa laa ya'lamoon

verses.arabic: وَءَايَةٌ لَّهُمُ ٱلَّيْلُ نَسْلَخُ مِنْهُ ٱلنَّهَارَ فَإِذَا هُم مُّظْلِمُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَءَايَةٌ لَّهُمُ ٱلَّيْلُ نَسْلَخُ مِنْهُ ٱلنَّهَارَ فَإِذَا هُم مُّظْلِمُونَ
verses.translation: And a sign for them is the night. We remove from it [the light of] day, so they are [left] in darkness.
verses.transliteration: Wa Aayatul lahumul lailu naslakhu minhun nahaara fa-izaa hum muzlimoon

verses.arabic: وَٱلشَّمْسُ تَجْرِى لِمُسْتَقَرٍّ لَّهَا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ تَقْدِيرُ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلْعَلِيمِ
verses.arabicSimple: وَٱلشَّمْسُ تَجْرِى لِمُسْتَقَرٍّ لَّهَا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ تَقْدِيرُ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلْعَلِيمِ
verses.translation: And the sun runs [on course] toward its stopping point. That is the determination of the Exalted in Might, the Knowing.
verses.transliteration: Wash-shamsu tajree limustaqarril lahaa; zaalika taqdeerul 'Azeezil Aleem

segments.translation: And the sun runs to a term appointed for it
That is the Decree of the All-Mighty the All-Knowing

verses.arabic: وَٱلْقَمَرَ قَدَّرْنَـٰهُ مَنَازِلَ حَتَّىٰ عَادَ كَٱلْعُرْجُونِ ٱلْقَدِيمِ
verses.arabicSimple: وَٱلْقَمَرَ قَدَّرْنَـٰهُ مَنَازِلَ حَتَّىٰ عَادَ كَٱلْعُرْجُونِ ٱلْقَدِيمِ
verses.translation: And the moon - We have determined for it phases, until it returns [appearing] like the old date stalk.
verses.transliteration: Walqamara qaddarnaahu manaazila hattaa 'aada kal'ur joonil qadeem

verses.arabic: لَا ٱلشَّمْسُ يَنۢبَغِى لَهَآ أَن تُدْرِكَ ٱلْقَمَرَ وَلَا ٱلَّيْلُ سَابِقُ ٱلنَّهَارِ ۚ وَكُلٌّ فِى فَلَكٍ يَسْبَحُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: لَا ٱلشَّمْسُ يَنۢبَغِى لَهَآ أَن تُدْرِكَ ٱلْقَمَرَ وَلَا ٱلَّيْلُ سَابِقُ ٱلنَّهَارِ ۚ وَكُلٌّ فِى فَلَكٍ يَسْبَحُونَ
verses.translation: It is not allowable for the sun to reach the moon, nor does the night overtake the day, but each, in an orbit, is swimming.
verses.transliteration: Lash shamsu yambaghee lahaaa an tudrikal qamara wa lal lailu saabiqun nahaar; wa kullun fee falaki yasbahoon

segments.arabic: لَا ٱلشَّمْسُ يَنۢبَغِى لَهَآ أَن تُدْرِكَ ٱلْقَمَرَ وَلَا ٱلَّيْلُ سَابِقُ ٱلنَّهَارِ ۚ
segments.translation: Not the sun is permitted for it that it overtakes the moon and not the night can outstrip the day
segments.transliteration: lā l-shamsu yanbaghī lahā an tud'rika l-qamara walā al-laylu sābiqu l-nahāri

segments.translation: but all in an orbit they are floating

verses.arabic: وَءَايَةٌ لَّهُمْ أَنَّا حَمَلْنَا ذُرِّيَّتَهُمْ فِى ٱلْفُلْكِ ٱلْمَشْحُونِ
verses.arabicSimple: وَءَايَةٌ لَّهُمْ أَنَّا حَمَلْنَا ذُرِّيَّتَهُمْ فِى ٱلْفُلْكِ ٱلْمَشْحُونِ
verses.translation: And a sign for them is that We carried their forefathers in a laden ship.
verses.transliteration: Wa Aayatul lahum annaa hamalnaa zurriyatahum fil fulkil mashhoon

verses.arabic: وَخَلَقْنَا لَهُم مِّن مِّثْلِهِۦ مَا يَرْكَبُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَخَلَقْنَا لَهُم مِّن مِّثْلِهِۦ مَا يَرْكَبُونَ
verses.translation: And We created for them from the likes of it that which they ride.
verses.transliteration: Wa khalaqnaa lahum mim-mislihee maa yarkaboon

verses.arabic: وَإِن نَّشَأْ نُغْرِقْهُمْ فَلَا صَرِيخَ لَهُمْ وَلَا هُمْ يُنقَذُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَإِن نَّشَأْ نُغْرِقْهُمْ فَلَا صَرِيخَ لَهُمْ وَلَا هُمْ يُنقَذُونَ
verses.translation: And if We should will, We could drown them; then no one responding to a cry would there be for them, nor would they be saved
verses.transliteration: Wa in nashaa nughriqhum falaa sareekha lahum wa laa hum yunqazoon

words.translation: (would be) a responder to a cry

verses.arabic: إِلَّا رَحْمَةً مِّنَّا وَمَتَـٰعًا إِلَىٰ حِينٍ
verses.arabicSimple: إِلَّا رَحْمَةً مِّنَّا وَمَتَـٰعًا إِلَىٰ حِينٍ
verses.translation: Except as a mercy from Us and provision for a time.
verses.transliteration: Illaa rahmatam minnaa wa mataa'an ilaa heen

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ٱتَّقُوا۟ مَا بَيْنَ أَيْدِيكُمْ وَمَا خَلْفَكُمْ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُرْحَمُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ٱتَّقُوا۟ مَا بَيْنَ أَيْدِيكُمْ وَمَا خَلْفَكُمْ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُرْحَمُونَ
verses.translation: But when it is said to them, "Beware of what is before you and what is behind you; perhaps you will receive mercy... "
verses.transliteration: Wa izaa qeela lahumuttaqoo maa baina aideekum wa maa khalfakum la'allakum turhamoon

verses.arabic: وَمَا تَأْتِيهِم مِّنْ ءَايَةٍ مِّنْ ءَايَـٰتِ رَبِّهِمْ إِلَّا كَانُوا۟ عَنْهَا مُعْرِضِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَمَا تَأْتِيهِم مِّنْ ءَايَةٍ مِّنْ ءَايَـٰتِ رَبِّهِمْ إِلَّا كَانُوا۟ عَنْهَا مُعْرِضِينَ
verses.translation: And no sign comes to them from the signs of their Lord except that they are from it turning away.
verses.transliteration: Wa maa taateehim min aayatim min ayataati Rabbihim illaa kaanoo 'anhaa mu'rideen

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمْ أَنفِقُوا۟ مِمَّا رَزَقَكُمُ ٱللَّهُ قَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ أَنُطْعِمُ مَن لَّوْ يَشَآءُ ٱللَّهُ أَطْعَمَهُۥٓ إِنْ أَنتُمْ إِلَّا فِى ضَلَـٰلٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.arabicSimple: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمْ أَنفِقُوا۟ مِمَّا رَزَقَكُمُ ٱللَّهُ قَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ أَنُطْعِمُ مَن لَّوْ يَشَآءُ ٱللَّهُ أَطْعَمَهُۥٓ إِنْ أَنتُمْ إِلَّا فِى ضَلَـٰلٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.translation: And when it is said to them, "Spend from that which Allah has provided for you," those who disbelieve say to those who believe, "Should we feed one whom, if Allah had willed, He would have fed? You are not but in clear error."
verses.transliteration: Wa izaa qeela lahum anfiqoo mimmaa razaqakumul laahu qaalal lazeena kafaroo lillazeena aamanooo anut'imu mal-law yashaaa'ul laahu at'amahooo in antum illaa fee dalaalim mubeen

verses.arabic: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَـٰذَا ٱلْوَعْدُ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَـٰذَا ٱلْوَعْدُ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ
verses.translation: And they say, "When is this promise, if you should be truthful?"
verses.transliteration: Wa yaqooloona mataa haazal wa'du in kuntum saadiqeen

verses.arabic: مَا يَنظُرُونَ إِلَّا صَيْحَةً وَٰحِدَةً تَأْخُذُهُمْ وَهُمْ يَخِصِّمُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: مَا يَنظُرُونَ إِلَّا صَيْحَةً وَٰحِدَةً تَأْخُذُهُمْ وَهُمْ يَخِصِّمُونَ
verses.translation: They do not await except one blast which will seize them while they are disputing.
verses.transliteration: Maa yanzuroona illaa saihatanw waahidatan taa khuzuhum wa hum yakhissimoon

verses.arabic: فَلَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ تَوْصِيَةً وَلَآ إِلَىٰٓ أَهْلِهِمْ يَرْجِعُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: فَلَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ تَوْصِيَةً وَلَآ إِلَىٰٓ أَهْلِهِمْ يَرْجِعُونَ
verses.translation: And they will not be able [to give] any instruction, nor to their people can they return.
verses.transliteration: Falaa yastatee'oona taw siyatanw-wa laaa ilaaa ahlihim yarji'oon

verses.arabic: وَنُفِخَ فِى ٱلصُّورِ فَإِذَا هُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَجْدَاثِ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِمْ يَنسِلُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَنُفِخَ فِى ٱلصُّورِ فَإِذَا هُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَجْدَاثِ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِمْ يَنسِلُونَ
verses.translation: And the Horn will be blown; and at once from the graves to their Lord they will hasten.
verses.transliteration: Wa nufikha fis-soori faizaa hum minal ajdaasi ilaa Rabbihim yansiloon

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ يَـٰوَيْلَنَا مَنۢ بَعَثَنَا مِن مَّرْقَدِنَا ۜ ۗ هَـٰذَا مَا وَعَدَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ وَصَدَقَ ٱلْمُرْسَلُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: قَالُوا۟ يَـٰوَيْلَنَا مَنۢ بَعَثَنَا مِن مَّرْقَدِنَا ۜ ۗ هَـٰذَا مَا وَعَدَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ وَصَدَقَ ٱلْمُرْسَلُونَ
verses.translation: They will say, "O woe to us! Who has raised us up from our sleeping place?" [The reply will be], "This is what the Most Merciful had promised, and the messengers told the truth."
verses.transliteration: Qaaloo yaa wailanaa mam ba'asanaa mim marqadinaa; haaza maa wa'adar Rahmanu wa sadaqal mursaloon

segments.arabic: قَالُوا۟ يَـٰوَيْلَنَا مَنۢ بَعَثَنَا مِن مَّرْقَدِنَا ۜ
segments.translation: They [will] say O woe to us Who has raised us from our sleeping place
segments.transliteration: qālū yāwaylanā man baʿathanā min marqadinā

segments.arabic: هَـٰذَا مَا وَعَدَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ وَصَدَقَ ٱلْمُرْسَلُونَ
segments.translation: This is What had promised the Most Gracious and told the truth the Messengers
segments.transliteration: hādhā mā waʿada l-raḥmānu waṣadaqa l-mur'salūna

verses.arabic: إِن كَانَتْ إِلَّا صَيْحَةً وَٰحِدَةً فَإِذَا هُمْ جَمِيعٌ لَّدَيْنَا مُحْضَرُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: إِن كَانَتْ إِلَّا صَيْحَةً وَٰحِدَةً فَإِذَا هُمْ جَمِيعٌ لَّدَيْنَا مُحْضَرُونَ
verses.translation: It will not be but one blast, and at once they are all brought present before Us.
verses.transliteration: In kaanat illaa saihatanw waahidatan fa-izaa hum jamee'ul ladainaa muhdaroon

verses.arabic: فَٱلْيَوْمَ لَا تُظْلَمُ نَفْسٌ شَيْـًٔا وَلَا تُجْزَوْنَ إِلَّا مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: فَٱلْيَوْمَ لَا تُظْلَمُ نَفْسٌ شَيْـًٔا وَلَا تُجْزَوْنَ إِلَّا مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.translation: So today no soul will be wronged at all, and you will not be recompensed except for what you used to do.
verses.transliteration: Fal-Yawma laa tuzlamu nafsun shai'anw-wa laa tujzawna illaa maa kuntum ta'maloon

verses.arabic: إِنَّ أَصْحَـٰبَ ٱلْجَنَّةِ ٱلْيَوْمَ فِى شُغُلٍ فَـٰكِهُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: إِنَّ أَصْحَـٰبَ ٱلْجَنَّةِ ٱلْيَوْمَ فِى شُغُلٍ فَـٰكِهُونَ
verses.translation: Indeed the companions of Paradise, that Day, will be amused in [joyful] occupation -
verses.transliteration: Inna Ashaabal jannatil Yawma fee shughulin faakihoon

verses.arabic: هُمْ وَأَزْوَٰجُهُمْ فِى ظِلَـٰلٍ عَلَى ٱلْأَرَآئِكِ مُتَّكِـُٔونَ
verses.arabicSimple: هُمْ وَأَزْوَٰجُهُمْ فِى ظِلَـٰلٍ عَلَى ٱلْأَرَآئِكِ مُتَّكِـُٔونَ
verses.translation: They and their spouses - in shade, reclining on adorned couches.
verses.transliteration: Hum wa azwaajuhum fee zilaalin 'alal araaa'iki muttaki'oon

verses.arabic: لَهُمْ فِيهَا فَـٰكِهَةٌ وَلَهُم مَّا يَدَّعُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: لَهُمْ فِيهَا فَـٰكِهَةٌ وَلَهُم مَّا يَدَّعُونَ
verses.translation: For them therein is fruit, and for them is whatever they request [or wish]
verses.transliteration: Lahum feehaa faakiha tunw-wa lahum maa yadda'oon

verses.arabic: سَلَـٰمٌ قَوْلًا مِّن رَّبٍّ رَّحِيمٍ
verses.arabicSimple: سَلَـٰمٌ قَوْلًا مِّن رَّبٍّ رَّحِيمٍ
verses.translation: [And] "Peace," a word from a Merciful Lord.
verses.transliteration: Salaamun qawlam mir Rabbir Raheem

verses.arabic: وَٱمْتَـٰزُوا۟ ٱلْيَوْمَ أَيُّهَا ٱلْمُجْرِمُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَٱمْتَـٰزُوا۟ ٱلْيَوْمَ أَيُّهَا ٱلْمُجْرِمُونَ
verses.translation: [Then He will say], "But stand apart today, you criminals.
verses.transliteration: Wamtaazul Yawma ayyuhal mujrimoon

verses.arabic: ۞ أَلَمْ أَعْهَدْ إِلَيْكُمْ يَـٰبَنِىٓ ءَادَمَ أَن لَّا تَعْبُدُوا۟ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنَ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ لَكُمْ عَدُوٌّ مُّبِينٌ
verses.arabicSimple: ۞ أَلَمْ أَعْهَدْ إِلَيْكُمْ يَـٰبَنِىٓ ءَادَمَ أَن لَّا تَعْبُدُوا۟ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنَ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ لَكُمْ عَدُوٌّ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation: Did I not enjoin upon you, O children of Adam, that you not worship Satan - [for] indeed, he is to you a clear enemy -
verses.transliteration: Alam a'had ilaikum yaa Baneee Aadama al-laa ta'budush Shaitaana innahoo lakum 'aduwwum mubeen

segments.arabic: ۞ أَلَمْ أَعْهَدْ إِلَيْكُمْ يَـٰبَنِىٓ ءَادَمَ أَن لَّا تَعْبُدُوا۟ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنَ ۖ
segments.translation: Did not I enjoin upon you O Children of Adam O Children of Adam That do not worship the Shaitaan indeed, he
segments.transliteration: alam aʿhad ilaykum yābanī ādama an lā taʿbudū l-shayṭāna innahu

segments.translation: is for you an enemy clear

verses.arabic: وَأَنِ ٱعْبُدُونِى ۚ هَـٰذَا صِرَٰطٌ مُّسْتَقِيمٌ
verses.arabicSimple: وَأَنِ ٱعْبُدُونِى ۚ هَـٰذَا صِرَٰطٌ مُّسْتَقِيمٌ
verses.translation: And that you worship [only] Me? This is a straight path.
verses.transliteration: Wa ani'budoonee; haazaa Siraatum Mustaqeem

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ أَضَلَّ مِنكُمْ جِبِلًّا كَثِيرًا ۖ أَفَلَمْ تَكُونُوا۟ تَعْقِلُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَلَقَدْ أَضَلَّ مِنكُمْ جِبِلًّا كَثِيرًا ۖ أَفَلَمْ تَكُونُوا۟ تَعْقِلُونَ
verses.translation: And he had already led astray from among you much of creation, so did you not use reason?
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad adalla minkum jibillan kaseeraa; afalam takoonoo ta'qiloon

segments.translation: And indeed he led astray from you a multitude great
Then did not you use reason

verses.arabic: هَـٰذِهِۦ جَهَنَّمُ ٱلَّتِى كُنتُمْ تُوعَدُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: هَـٰذِهِۦ جَهَنَّمُ ٱلَّتِى كُنتُمْ تُوعَدُونَ
verses.translation: This is the Hellfire which you were promised.
verses.transliteration: Haazihee Jahannamul latee kuntum too'adoon

verses.arabic: ٱصْلَوْهَا ٱلْيَوْمَ بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَكْفُرُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: ٱصْلَوْهَا ٱلْيَوْمَ بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَكْفُرُونَ
verses.translation: [Enter to] burn therein today for what you used to deny."
verses.transliteration: Islawhal Yawma bimaa kuntum takfuroon

verses.arabic: ٱلْيَوْمَ نَخْتِمُ عَلَىٰٓ أَفْوَٰهِهِمْ وَتُكَلِّمُنَآ أَيْدِيهِمْ وَتَشْهَدُ أَرْجُلُهُم بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَكْسِبُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: ٱلْيَوْمَ نَخْتِمُ عَلَىٰٓ أَفْوَٰهِهِمْ وَتُكَلِّمُنَآ أَيْدِيهِمْ وَتَشْهَدُ أَرْجُلُهُم بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَكْسِبُونَ
verses.translation: That Day, We will seal over their mouths, and their hands will speak to Us, and their feet will testify about what they used to earn.
verses.transliteration: Al-Yawma nakhtimu 'alaaa afwaahihim wa tukallimunaaa aideehim wa tashhadu arjuluhum bimaa kaanoo yaksiboon

verses.arabic: وَلَوْ نَشَآءُ لَطَمَسْنَا عَلَىٰٓ أَعْيُنِهِمْ فَٱسْتَبَقُوا۟ ٱلصِّرَٰطَ فَأَنَّىٰ يُبْصِرُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَلَوْ نَشَآءُ لَطَمَسْنَا عَلَىٰٓ أَعْيُنِهِمْ فَٱسْتَبَقُوا۟ ٱلصِّرَٰطَ فَأَنَّىٰ يُبْصِرُونَ
verses.translation: And if We willed, We could have obliterated their eyes, and they would race to [find] the path, and how could they see?
verses.transliteration: Wa law nashaaa'u lata masna 'alaaa aiyunihim fasta baqus-siraata fa-annaa yubsiroon

verses.arabic: وَلَوْ نَشَآءُ لَمَسَخْنَـٰهُمْ عَلَىٰ مَكَانَتِهِمْ فَمَا ٱسْتَطَـٰعُوا۟ مُضِيًّا وَلَا يَرْجِعُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَلَوْ نَشَآءُ لَمَسَخْنَـٰهُمْ عَلَىٰ مَكَانَتِهِمْ فَمَا ٱسْتَطَـٰعُوا۟ مُضِيًّا وَلَا يَرْجِعُونَ
verses.translation: And if We willed, We could have deformed them, [paralyzing them] in their places so they would not be able to proceed, nor could they return.
verses.transliteration: Wa law nashaaa'u lamasakhnaahum 'alaa makaanatihim famas-tataa'oo mudiyyanw-wa laa yarji'oon

verses.arabic: وَمَن نُّعَمِّرْهُ نُنَكِّسْهُ فِى ٱلْخَلْقِ ۖ أَفَلَا يَعْقِلُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَمَن نُّعَمِّرْهُ نُنَكِّسْهُ فِى ٱلْخَلْقِ ۖ أَفَلَا يَعْقِلُونَ
verses.translation: And he to whom We grant long life We reverse in creation; so will they not understand?
verses.transliteration: Wa man nu 'ammirhu nunakkishu fil-khalq; afalaa ya'qiloon

segments.translation: And he whom We grant him long life We reverse him in the creation
Then will not they use intellect

verses.arabic: وَمَا عَلَّمْنَـٰهُ ٱلشِّعْرَ وَمَا يَنۢبَغِى لَهُۥٓ ۚ إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْرٌ وَقُرْءَانٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.arabicSimple: وَمَا عَلَّمْنَـٰهُ ٱلشِّعْرَ وَمَا يَنۢبَغِى لَهُۥٓ ۚ إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْرٌ وَقُرْءَانٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation: And We did not give Prophet Muhammad, knowledge of poetry, nor is it befitting for him. It is not but a message and a clear Qur'an
verses.transliteration: Wa maa 'allamnaahush shi'ra wa maa yambaghee lah; in huwa illaa zikrunw-wa Qur-aanum mubeen

segments.arabic: وَمَا عَلَّمْنَـٰهُ ٱلشِّعْرَ وَمَا يَنۢبَغِى لَهُۥٓ ۚ
segments.translation: And not We taught him [the] poetry and not it is befitting for him
segments.transliteration: wamā ʿallamnāhu l-shiʿ'ra wamā yanbaghī lahu

segments.arabic: إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْرٌ وَقُرْءَانٌ مُّبِينٌ
segments.translation: Not it is except a Reminder and a Quran clear
segments.transliteration: in huwa illā dhik'run waqur'ānun mubīnun

verses.arabic: لِّيُنذِرَ مَن كَانَ حَيًّا وَيَحِقَّ ٱلْقَوْلُ عَلَى ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
verses.arabicSimple: لِّيُنذِرَ مَن كَانَ حَيًّا وَيَحِقَّ ٱلْقَوْلُ عَلَى ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
verses.translation: To warn whoever is alive and justify the word against the disbelievers.
verses.transliteration: Liyunzira man kaana haiyanw-wa yahiqqal qawlu 'alal-kaafireen

verses.arabic: أَوَلَمْ يَرَوْا۟ أَنَّا خَلَقْنَا لَهُم مِّمَّا عَمِلَتْ أَيْدِينَآ أَنْعَـٰمًا فَهُمْ لَهَا مَـٰلِكُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: أَوَلَمْ يَرَوْا۟ أَنَّا خَلَقْنَا لَهُم مِّمَّا عَمِلَتْ أَيْدِينَآ أَنْعَـٰمًا فَهُمْ لَهَا مَـٰلِكُونَ
verses.translation: Do they not see that We have created for them from what Our hands have made, grazing livestock, and [then] they are their owners?
verses.transliteration: Awalam yaraw annaa khalaqnaa lahum mimmaa 'amilat aideenaaa an'aaman fahum lahaa maalikoon

verses.arabic: وَذَلَّلْنَـٰهَا لَهُمْ فَمِنْهَا رَكُوبُهُمْ وَمِنْهَا يَأْكُلُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَذَلَّلْنَـٰهَا لَهُمْ فَمِنْهَا رَكُوبُهُمْ وَمِنْهَا يَأْكُلُونَ
verses.translation: And We have tamed them for them, so some of them they ride, and some of them they eat.
verses.transliteration: Wa zallalnaahaa lahum faminhaa rakoobuhum wa minhaa yaakuloon

verses.arabic: وَلَهُمْ فِيهَا مَنَـٰفِعُ وَمَشَارِبُ ۖ أَفَلَا يَشْكُرُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَلَهُمْ فِيهَا مَنَـٰفِعُ وَمَشَارِبُ ۖ أَفَلَا يَشْكُرُونَ
verses.translation: And for them therein are [other] benefits and drinks, so will they not be grateful?
verses.transliteration: Wa lahum feehaa manaa fi'u wa mashaarib; afalaa yashkuroon

segments.translation: And for them therein are benefits and drinks
so will not they give thanks

verses.arabic: وَٱتَّخَذُوا۟ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ ءَالِهَةً لَّعَلَّهُمْ يُنصَرُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَٱتَّخَذُوا۟ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ ءَالِهَةً لَّعَلَّهُمْ يُنصَرُونَ
verses.translation: But they have taken besides Allah [false] deities that perhaps they would be helped.
verses.transliteration: Wattakhazoo min doonil laahi aalihatal la'allahum yunsaroon

verses.arabic: لَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ نَصْرَهُمْ وَهُمْ لَهُمْ جُندٌ مُّحْضَرُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: لَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ نَصْرَهُمْ وَهُمْ لَهُمْ جُندٌ مُّحْضَرُونَ
verses.translation: They are not able to help them, and they [themselves] are for them soldiers in attendance.
verses.transliteration: Laa yastatee'oona nasrahum wa hum lahum jundum muhdaroon

verses.arabic: فَلَا يَحْزُنكَ قَوْلُهُمْ ۘ إِنَّا نَعْلَمُ مَا يُسِرُّونَ وَمَا يُعْلِنُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: فَلَا يَحْزُنكَ قَوْلُهُمْ ۘ إِنَّا نَعْلَمُ مَا يُسِرُّونَ وَمَا يُعْلِنُونَ
verses.translation: So let not their speech grieve you. Indeed, We know what they conceal and what they declare.
verses.transliteration: Falaa yahzunka qawluhum; innaa na'lamu maa yusirroona wa maa yu'linoon

segments.translation: So let not grieve you their speech

segments.arabic: إِنَّا نَعْلَمُ مَا يُسِرُّونَ وَمَا يُعْلِنُونَ
segments.translation: Indeed, We [We] know what they conceal and what they declare
segments.transliteration: innā naʿlamu mā yusirrūna wamā yuʿ'linūna

verses.arabic: أَوَلَمْ يَرَ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ أَنَّا خَلَقْنَـٰهُ مِن نُّطْفَةٍ فَإِذَا هُوَ خَصِيمٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.arabicSimple: أَوَلَمْ يَرَ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ أَنَّا خَلَقْنَـٰهُ مِن نُّطْفَةٍ فَإِذَا هُوَ خَصِيمٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation: Does man not consider that We created him from a [mere] sperm-drop - then at once he is a clear adversary?
verses.transliteration: Awalam yaral insaanu annaa khalaqnaahu min nutfatin fa-izaa huwa khaseemum mubeen

verses.arabic: وَضَرَبَ لَنَا مَثَلًا وَنَسِىَ خَلْقَهُۥ ۖ قَالَ مَن يُحْىِ ٱلْعِظَـٰمَ وَهِىَ رَمِيمٌ
verses.arabicSimple: وَضَرَبَ لَنَا مَثَلًا وَنَسِىَ خَلْقَهُۥ ۖ قَالَ مَن يُحْىِ ٱلْعِظَـٰمَ وَهِىَ رَمِيمٌ
verses.translation: And he presents for Us an example and forgets his [own] creation. He says, "Who will give life to bones while they are disintegrated?"
verses.transliteration: Wa daraba lanaa maslanw-wa nasiya khalqahoo qaala mai-yuhyil'izaama wa hiya rameem

segments.translation: And he sets forth for Us an example and forgets his own creation

segments.arabic: قَالَ مَن يُحْىِ ٱلْعِظَـٰمَ وَهِىَ رَمِيمٌ
segments.translation: He says Who will give life to the bones while they are decomposed
segments.transliteration: qāla man yuḥ'yī l-ʿiẓāma wahiya ramīmun

verses.arabic: قُلْ يُحْيِيهَا ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنشَأَهَآ أَوَّلَ مَرَّةٍ ۖ وَهُوَ بِكُلِّ خَلْقٍ عَلِيمٌ
verses.arabicSimple: قُلْ يُحْيِيهَا ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنشَأَهَآ أَوَّلَ مَرَّةٍ ۖ وَهُوَ بِكُلِّ خَلْقٍ عَلِيمٌ
verses.translation: Say, "He will give them life who produced them the first time; and He is, of all creation, Knowing."
verses.transliteration: Qul yuh yeehal lazeee ansha ahaaa awwala marrah; wa Huwa bikulli khalqin 'Aleem

segments.arabic: قُلْ يُحْيِيهَا ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنشَأَهَآ أَوَّلَ مَرَّةٍ ۖ
segments.translation: Say He will give them life Who produced them the first time
segments.transliteration: qul yuḥ'yīhā alladhī ansha-ahā awwala marratin

segments.translation: and He is of every creation All-Knower

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ لَكُم مِّنَ ٱلشَّجَرِ ٱلْأَخْضَرِ نَارًا فَإِذَآ أَنتُم مِّنْهُ تُوقِدُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ لَكُم مِّنَ ٱلشَّجَرِ ٱلْأَخْضَرِ نَارًا فَإِذَآ أَنتُم مِّنْهُ تُوقِدُونَ
verses.translation: [It is] He who made for you from the green tree, fire, and then from it you ignite.
verses.transliteration: Allazee ja'ala lakum minash shajaril akhdari naaran fa-izaaa antum minhu tooqidoon

verses.arabic: أَوَلَيْسَ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ بِقَـٰدِرٍ عَلَىٰٓ أَن يَخْلُقَ مِثْلَهُم ۚ بَلَىٰ وَهُوَ ٱلْخَلَّـٰقُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ
verses.arabicSimple: أَوَلَيْسَ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ بِقَـٰدِرٍ عَلَىٰٓ أَن يَخْلُقَ مِثْلَهُم ۚ بَلَىٰ وَهُوَ ٱلْخَلَّـٰقُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ
verses.translation: Is not He who created the heavens and the earth Able to create the likes of them? Yes, [it is so]; and He is the Knowing Creator.
verses.transliteration: Awa laisal lazee khalaqas samaawaati wal arda biqaadirin 'alaaa ai-yakhluqa mislahum; balaa wa Huwal Khallaaqul 'Aleem

segments.arabic: أَوَلَيْسَ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ بِقَـٰدِرٍ عَلَىٰٓ أَن يَخْلُقَ مِثْلَهُم ۚ
segments.translation: Is it not He Who created the heavens and the earth Able to [that] create the like of them
segments.transliteration: awalaysa alladhī khalaqa l-samāwāti wal-arḍa biqādirin ʿalā an yakhluqa mith'lahum

segments.translation: Yes, indeed and He is the Supreme Creator the All-Knower

verses.arabic: إِنَّمَآ أَمْرُهُۥٓ إِذَآ أَرَادَ شَيْـًٔا أَن يَقُولَ لَهُۥ كُن فَيَكُونُ
verses.arabicSimple: إِنَّمَآ أَمْرُهُۥٓ إِذَآ أَرَادَ شَيْـًٔا أَن يَقُولَ لَهُۥ كُن فَيَكُونُ
verses.translation: His command is only when He intends a thing that He says to it, "Be," and it is.
verses.transliteration: Innamaa amruhooo izaaa araada shai'an ai-yaqoola lahoo kun fa-yakoon

verses.arabic: فَسُبْحَـٰنَ ٱلَّذِى بِيَدِهِۦ مَلَكُوتُ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ وَإِلَيْهِ تُرْجَعُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: فَسُبْحَـٰنَ ٱلَّذِى بِيَدِهِۦ مَلَكُوتُ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ وَإِلَيْهِ تُرْجَعُونَ
verses.translation: So exalted is He in whose hand is the realm of all things, and to Him you will be returned.
verses.transliteration: Fa Subhaanal lazee biyadihee malakootu kulli shai-inw-wa ilaihi turja'oon
